name: Live Streaming
description: Broadcast live events or presentations to a remote audience in real-time.

name: Podcast
description: Create and distribute audio programs for listeners to subscribe and enjoy on-demand.

name: Social Media Content
description: Develop engaging content (text, images, videos) for promoting your brand or message on social media platforms.

name: EdTech Classroom
description: Leverage educational technology tools and platforms to enhance the learning experience in a classroom setting.

name: Photo Shoot
description: Capture professional-quality photographs for various purposes, such as product shots, portraits, or event coverage.
